text: (aur musalamaanon) tumako kya ho gaya hai ki khuda kee raah mein un kamazor aur bebas mardo aur auraton aur bachchon (ko kuphfaar ke panje se chhudaane) ke vaaste jehaad nahin karate jo (haalate majabooree mein) khuda se duaen mog rahe hain ki ai hamaare paalane vaale kisee tarah is bastee (makka) se jisake baashinde bade zaalim hain hamen nikaal aur apanee taraf se kisee ko hamaara saraparast bana aur too khud hee kisee ko apanee taraf se hamaara madadagaar bana
